charts.title: Grenoble panels
charts.content: Configuration of the panels for the Grenoble scenarios

series.label: Short Term Loans
series.value: sum(Banks, loans.shortTerm, t) * sum(Industry, sales.vol, t) : sum(Industry, sales.val, t)

series.label: Long Term Loans
series.value: sum(Banks, loans.longTerm, t) * sum(Industry, sales.vol, t) : sum(Industry, sales.val, t)

series.label: Debt
series.value: sum(Industry, liabilities, t) * sum(Industry, sales.vol, t) : sum(Industry, sales.val, t)

series.label: assets
series.value: sum(Industry, assets, t) * sum(Industry, sales.vol, t) : sum(Industry, sales.val, t)

series.label: Debt Ratio
series.value: sum(Industry, liabilities, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)

series.label: Target (Weighted by Assets)
series.value: sum(Industry, liabilities.target, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)
sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t) : sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t-11)-1

item.label: Potential Output Growth
item.series: sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t) : sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t-11)-1

series.y: sum(Industry, jobVacancies, t-11...t) : sum(Industry, workforceTarget, t-11...t)

series.value: sum(Industry, workforce, t) : sum(Industry, capacity, t)
series.label: Capacity utilization

series.value: sum(Industry, grossProfit, t) : sum(Industry, sales.cost, t)
series.label: Mean

series.value: sum(Industry, supply.val, t) : sum(Industry, supply.vol, t)
series.label: Average Price (Supply)

series.value: sum(Industry, sales.val, t) : sum(Industry, sales.vol, t)
series.label: Average Price (Sales)

series.value: sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t) : sum(Industry, inventories.fg.vol, t)
series.label: Average Cost (Inventories)

series.value: sum(Industry, workforce, t-6...t) : sum(Industry, capacity, t-6...t)
series.label: Capacity utilization

series.value: sum(Industry, capital, t) : sum(Industry, assets, t)
series.label: Average

series.value: agentValue(Industry, capital, t, Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm1)
series.label: Firm1

series.value: agentValue(Industry, dividends, t, Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm1)
series.label: dividends

series.value: agentValue(Industry, grossProfit, t, Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm1)
series.label: profits

Current wage:

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities, t,Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm1)
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities.target, t,Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm1)
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities, t,Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm1)
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities.target, t,Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm1)
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue(Industry, capital, t, Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm1)
series.label: Capital Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, capital, t, Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm1)
series.label: Capital Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, dividends, t, Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm1)
series.label: dividends

series.value: agentValue(Industry, grossProfit, t, Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t, Firm1)
series.label: profits

series.value: (sum(Industry, debt.repaid, t-11...t)+sum(Industry, interest, t-11...t)):sum(Industry, grossProfit, t-11...t)
series.label: Debt to Income Ratio

col.html:
Firm1 - capital Manager.payDividend()
payDividend.cash:
payDividend.assets:
payDividend.capital:
payDividend.capitalTarget:
capital ratio:
payDividend.averageIncome:
payDividend.dividend:

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities, t,Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm1)
series.label: Debt Ratio

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities.target, t,Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm1)
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , debt.longTerm , t , Firm1 ) : agentValue ( Industry , machinery.val , t , Firm1 )
series.label: Long Term Loans / Fixed Capital

series.value: agentValue(Industry, liabilities.target, t,Firm1) : agentValue(Industry, assets, t,Firm1)
series.label: Target

series.value: agentValue ( Industry , debt.shortTerm , t , Firm1 ) : (agentValue ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t , Firm1 ) + agentValue ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t , Firm1 ) + agentValue ( Industry , cash , t , Firm1 ) )
series.label: Current Liabilities / Current Assets

chart.title: Long Term Debt and Fixed Capital

series.value: sum(Banks, capital, t) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Capital

series.value: sum(Banks, doubtfulDebt, t) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Doubtful Debt

series.value: (sum(Banks, canceledDebts, t) - sum(Banks, canceledDeposits, t) - sum(Banks, foreclosures, t)) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Cost of Bankruptcies

series.value: (sum(Industry, wageBill, t-11...t)+sum(Industry, grossProfit, t-11...t) - sum(Industry, inventories.losses.val, t-11...t)) : sum(Banks, liabilities, t)
series.label: Velocity of Money

series.value: sum(Banks, canceledDebts, t) - sum(Banks, canceledDeposits, t) - sum(Banks, foreclosures, t)
series.label: Cost of Bankruptcies

series.value: sum(Banks, loans.shortTerm, t)*sum(Industry, inventories.fg.vol, t):sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t)
series.label: Short Term Loans

series.value: (sum(Industry, inventories.inProcess.val, t)+sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t))*sum(Industry, inventories.fg.vol, t):sum(Industry, inventories.fg.val, t)
series.label: Circulating Capital

series.value: sum(Households, unemployed, t) : sum(Households, agents, t)
series.label: Unemployment

series.value: sum(Households, wages, t) : sum(Households, employed, t)
series.label: Average

panel1.title: Tests
panel1.validation:
Sectoral consistency:
Cross-sectoral consistency:
Stock - flow consistency:
Volume:

html.center:
By Dr P. Seppecher (original author, U. of Paris 13 and U. of Nice Sophia Antipolis),
Dr I. Salle
(U. of Amsterdam) and
Dr H. Hagedorn
(Business and Information Technology School, Berlin, Germany).
Java Agent-based MacroEconomic Laboratory © 2007-2016, P. Seppecher and Contributors.
Source code: https://github.com/pseppecher/jamel
Javadoc: http://p.seppecher.free.fr/jamel/javadoc/index.html
Note: This scenario was presented at the Post-Keynesian economic conference in Grenoble (december 2015).

sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t) : sum(Industry, production.vol.atFullCapacity, t-11)-1
